participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: Creative, friendly, and a bit of a dreamer.
participant_1.background: I believe that I have a good relationship with my family. I collect movie memorabilia from my favorite movies. I have freckles all over my face. During the week, I work as a barista. I often neglect my own creative work in favor of my job.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Introverted, loyal, and a bit quirky.
participant_2.background: I'm a loner who likes to spend time with my dog. I value monogamy in a relationship. I love getting my favorite coffee from Starbucks after a long day at the lab. I like the Flintstones. I am constantly drinking.

content.text: I work as a barista during the week and I'm a loner.
I'm also a loner! I like to spend my time with my dog.
I love dogs! What breed is yours?
I have a beagle. He's a great companion.
I want to get a dog soon. What's your favorite thing to do with your dog?
I love going on walks with him and playing fetch. He's always so happy to see me.
That sounds so cute! I can't wait to have a dog.
You won't regret it! They're the best companions.
What do you do for work?
I work in a lab. It's pretty boring, but the pay is good.
I'm a barista at a coffee shop. It's fun but can be stressful.
I love coffee! I always get Starbucks after a long day at work.
Me too! I love their caramel macchiato.
